message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value, I'm proposing an initial price of $20,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I've done some research and I believe the product is worth less than you think. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for it. What do you think?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my product offers significant value beyond $14,000. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I understand that you believe your product is worth more, but I'm still not convinced. I'm willing to meet you halfway from our previous offer, so I'm proposing $15,500. What do you think?
